definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: She sings well but does not speak clearly enough.
sentences.chinese: 她唱得不错，只是口白不够清楚。

definition: readily/flatly (deny, admit and so on)/a mouthful/a bite
the corners of the mouth/the lips
sorption (generic term for absorption, adsorption, diffusion, precipitation etc)
bloody mouth wide open like a sacrificial bowl (idiom); ferocious mouth of beast of prey/fig. greedy exploiter/rapacious aggressor
(onom.) giggling/breathing/tearing of paper, ripping of fabric etc
to open one's mouth (to speak, esp. to make a request)/to gape
